2.name: Player
2.Text: It looks like some sort of drone... I shouldn't touch those cables, they must be dangerous!

3.name: Player
3.Text: But i could ask for help! Somebody is surely piloting it!

4.name: Player
4.Text: Please help,i don't know where i am! Please help me!

6.name: Player
6.Text: Not even a sign of life...

7.name: Player
7.Text: To get past I'll have to destroy it...

8.name: Player
8.Text: I think that his blades are his weak spot. I'll try to jump on it and avoid those cables!
